Name: A Moustache in the House
About the game: A game where the player wakes up one day and discovers someone has been spying on him. After this discovery the player gets trapped in his own house and has to find a way out, but it won't be that easy... The player has to run and hide from Moustache and his gadgets, solve puzzles and discover the terrible secrets about Moustache.
